attributes.action: Make doctors see patients face to face
attributes.additional_details: Get the doctors to provide the people with a good accessible service instead of overloading the hospital A&E
attributes.background: Since the easing of restrictions doctors are still not seeing patients face to face. We are having to wait 2-3 weeks to talk to a doctor about any minor ailments. if its good enough to open the shops pubs and restaurants it's good enough to open the doctors..people need to access this service..

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587701
